basic.floral_language:
Haworthia cymbiformis 
Floriography: pure, bright, crystal-clear
Has a compact and short plant form, fleshy green leaves are long oval and slightly tipped, arranged in a rosette, surface marked with longitudinal dark green stripes, crystal-clear and bright, grows slowly, may be grown alone, or used in combinations with other plants in pots.
Likes half shaded environments, avoid direct strong sunlight, need shade properly under scattered light. Flowers are light green.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light green flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes half shade environments, avoid direct strong light, suitable in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
